name: Unit0
description: Units.Network is a modular blockchain ecosystem designed to enable infinite scalability and seamless interoperability across all connected chains. At the core of the ecosystem lies Unit Zero - a high-performance and secure Waves-based network featuring EVM compatibility, decentralized governance, and future-ready interoperability, all powered by LPoS consensus and Unit0-driven incentives. Units.Network concept: DAO-based EVM chain factory. Units.Network allows users to launch sidechains without deep technical knowledge just in few clicks.
